workflow.title: All Pairs Filter
workflow.description: This workflow filters a given Ondex graph based on the occurrence of directed edges within the graph. Only those concepts that have directional edges are returned to the user, in the form of a new graph. The parameters that can be used with this service are as follows:graphId - the ID of the input Graph.outputGraphId - the ID of the output Graph. Optional parameter. If no output graph is specified filtered items will be removed from the input graph.GdsWeight - The name of the GDS type to be used as edge weights.OnlyDirectedEdges - Follow edges only according to their direction (Optional). Default value is false. (boolean)InverseWeight - Takes the inverse of the GDS value as the weight. This is for probabilities or scores (Optional). Default value is false. (boolean)
